meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the May 14, 2024 Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the previous meeting of the City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions for West Virginia Apartments
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a financing resolution authorizing the issuance, sale and delivery of the City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Multifamily Tax-Exempt Bonds Series 2024A and Multifamily Housing Revenue Bonds Series 2024B in the aggregate principal amount of up to $32,000,000.00.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions relating to renewal of the Corporation’s participation in the single-family home mortgage program
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution approving an assignment agreement with the Texas Department of Housing and Community Affairs authorizing TDHCA to issue bonds for financing home mortgage loans.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Treasurer’s report for the four-month period ending on April 30, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of June 7, 2024.
